Many new features, please check Setting.
* Pressure tracking and history graph (Require "Background App Refresh").
* Notification about pressure change.
* Export history to CSV format and customize notification change value (Pro feature)
* Fixes mmHg display

Improve trend information with weather icons on the disk. Please note that with only air pressure, the trend info not always accurate.
Fix QNH from ICAO code.
WARNING: For the unknown reason, barometer on iPad iOS 10 does not work. Please waiting for an OS update to fix it.

"Exact update interval" for pressure tracking (for Pro user only). It is disable by default, you can enable it in Settings.
Exact update interval require location update in the background. “Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.”
You may see a blue banner show "Barometer Plus is using your location" after press home button, if you don't want to see it, open iPhone/iPad Settings app,
choose Privacy and then Location Services, choose Barometer Plus and then select Always.
WARNING: Barometer on iPad iOS 10 does not work. Please update to iOS 10.1 to fix it.

Add marker needle, swipe up/down to change it, you can turn on it in Settings.
There are many more features in Settings, please check it.
If negative review could not solve your problem, please email us at: support+barometer@pvdapps.com or use "Feedback" button to get support.

Breaking changes:
- New "Custom Notification" feature, please check Notification from the menu.
- Weather notification: app now notified you when worse weather may occur follow the changes of air pressure like: gale, storm, strong wind, etc
Allow zoom y axis for Graph.
You can check "User Guide" page to learn more about app.
Bug fixes and performance improvement.
There are many more features in Settings, please discover.
